# PopoverHeader

`PopoverHeader` can be attached to the top of Popover and provides a button to close the containing Popover.

- `hideClose` removes the "close" `IconButton`
- `detail` allows the developer to specify a ReactNode that will replace the "close" `IconButton`

<MessageBar noActions intent="warn">
  NOTE: don't use `hideClose` and `detail` together
</MessageBar>

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

## hideClose

<Editor code={storyHideClose} />

## Detail

<Editor code={storyDetail} />

## Props

<ArgsTable of={PopoverHeader} exclude={excludedProps} />
